function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited studies on the post-occupancy evaluation poe of health club facilities","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in evaluating and proposing effective pandemic precautionary measures for health club facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 within sports facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate pandemic prevention measures in sports facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate facility management and operational practices for pandemic prevention","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
